info.title: Cisco-IOS-XE-ospf-oper
info.description:
This module contains a collection of YANG definitions for
     monitoring the operation of ospf protocol in a Network Element.
     Copyright (c) 2016-2020, 2022 by Cisco Systems, Inc.
     All rights reserved.

Cisco IOS-XE operational state data (read-only).
**Category:** Routing Protocols
**Paths:** 10

**YANG Model:** [Cisco-IOS-XE-ospf-oper.yang](https://github.com/YangModels/yang/blob/main/vendor/cisco/xe/17181/Cisco-IOS-XE-ospf-oper.yang)

**📊 YANG Tree:** [View Cisco-IOS-XE-ospf-oper structure](https://jeremycohoe.github.io/cisco-ios-xe-openapi-swagger/yang-trees/Cisco-IOS-XE-ospf-oper.html)
